// url : http://www.codechef.com/problems/AXR1P2/
#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstring>
#include <vector>
#include <cstdlib>

using namespace std;

int arr[] = {1, 6, 1, 6, 5, 6, 1, 6, 1, 0};

int main()
{
	 char ch[10];
	 while(scanf("%s",&ch) > 0)
	 {
			  if(ch[0] == '#')break;
			  int n = atoi(ch);
			  if(n < 11)
			  {
					 if(n == 1)printf("1\n");
					 if(n == 2)printf("5\n");
					 if(n == 3)printf("4\n");
					 if(n == 4)printf("0\n");
					 if(n == 5)printf("5\n");
					 if(n == 6)printf("1\n");
					 if(n == 7)printf("2\n");
					 if(n == 8)printf("8\n");
					 if(n == 9)printf("9\n");
					 if(n == 10)printf("9\n");
					 continue;
  		 	  }
  		 	  int sum = 39;
  		 	  for(int k = 11; k <= n; k++)
  		 	  {
						 sum += arr[(k - 1) % 10];
 	 		  }
 	 		  printf("%d\n", sum % 10);
  	 }

	 return 0;
}
